title: NinesShop E-Commerce Website
description: A dynamic e-commerce platform tailored for beauty and cosmetic products. Designed for a client studying in Poland, the site offers a sleek UI reminiscent of SHEIN but focused entirely on makeup and beauty essentials.

title: Benzerjeb School App
description: A modern mobile app for a private tutoring school, allowing students to track weekly lessons, manage notes, reminders, and get real-time notifications. The UI is complete and currently under development for deployment.

title: Foodi - Food Delivery App
description: An intuitive food delivery app showcasing modern UI with sections for promotions, offers, and meal browsing. This app was a UI concept project focused on user-friendly design and layout.

title: Graduation Project - Smart Energy App
description: An IoT-connected mobile app for managing a solar-powered system. It features real-time control, AI assistant integration for data analysis, and full monitoring capabilities. Designed as part of an academic graduation project.

title: Fruit Hub
description: A fresh and colorful app for ordering fruits and vegetables. Fully designed with a modern touch, ready for development and integration with delivery systems.

title: Health Meals Website
description: A clean, minimal design for a website that offers healthy food orders. Focused on promoting wellness through curated meal options. Currently a UI project.

title: Health Assist App
description: A mobile assistant app for patients with chronic illnesses. Features include doctor communication, food scanning, recipe suggestions, medication reminders, and expert doctor listings by region. UI design completed.

title: Joe Identity Designs
description: A branding and identity design project created for a Jordanian barbershop chain. Includes professional logos and full branding elements with a stylish, masculine aesthetic.

title: Joe Barbershop Website
description: A web design concept for a premium barbershop, showcasing the brand, services offered (standard & VIP), and contact booking. A sleek and responsive UI project.

title: Sweet Breakfast App
description: A delightful mobile app concept to help users explore and schedule sweet breakfast recipes. Includes favorites, calendar meal planning, and preparation steps. UI-focused project.

title: Hawess - Tlemcen Tourist Guide App
description: An ongoing mobile app project that highlights the hidden and popular tourist spots, foods, and traditional clothing of Tlemcen. A cultural guide in your pocket.

title: Climate Justice Website
description: A website dedicated to raising awareness about climate change and environmental justice. Features educational content, resources, and ways to get involved. Currently a UI design project.
